channel.title: Posts on Hi, I'm Jason Siu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hi, I'm Jason Siu

item.title: THM: Archangel CTF Writeup
item.description: Hello everyone, Today’s writeup will be about Archangel from TryHackMe. This is a tough CTF challenge involving LFI, Apache Log Poisoning, and editing system commands. However, because it is so unique, it’s a good learning experience. You can view my PDF of this writeup here. Hope you guys enjoy and learn something. – Jason
item.content:
Hello everyone,

Today’s writeup will be about Archangel from TryHackMe.

This is a tough CTF challenge involving LFI, Apache Log Poisoning, and editing system commands.

However, because it is so unique, it’s a good learning experience.

You can view my PDF of this writeup here.

Hope you guys enjoy and learn something.

– Jason

item.title: Penetration Testing Presentation @ CSG: Sesame
item.description: Hello everyone! This is my presentation from CSG Firetalks about my experience penetration testing into a web app called “Sesame”. CSG officers and students there really enjoyed this presentation and I hope you will too. This was my first real break into penetration testing and I learned a lot of things from communicating bugs, to actual penetration testing. Have a great rest of the day, and I hope you learned something – Jason
item.content:
Hello everyone!

This is my presentation from CSG Firetalks about my experience penetration testing into a web app called “Sesame”.

CSG officers and students there really enjoyed this presentation and I hope you will too.

This was my first real break into penetration testing and I learned a lot of things from communicating bugs, to actual penetration testing.

Have a great rest of the day, and I hope you learned something – Jason

item.title: How To Hack Any Flash Game
item.description: Hey everyone, I’ve made a video on how to hack flash games. I personally used to play flash games a lot when I was a kid, and this was my introductory to reverse engineering and cybersecurity in general. Hope you enjoy. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Timecodes: 0:00 - Start 0:40 - Requirements 1:27- Download the Flash Game 3:25 - Unlimited Health Hack 10:27 - Testing Hack #1
item.content:
Hey everyone, I’ve made a video on how to hack flash games.

I personally used to play flash games a lot when I was a kid, and this was my introductory to reverse engineering and cybersecurity in general.

Hope you enjoy.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Timecodes:

0:00 - Start

0:40 - Requirements

1:27- Download the Flash Game

3:25 - Unlimited Health Hack

10:27 - Testing Hack #1

10:55 - Unlimited Ammo Hack

15:37 - Testing Hack #2

16:30 - Bypassing paywalls

22:56 - Locating our save file

24:52 - Testing Paywall bypass

27:17 - Editing Save File (unlimited credits)

30:00 - Testing our edited save file

31:05 - Unlocked ALL levels

32:40 - Testing unlocking all campaign with the save file

item.title: THM: Chillhack CTF Writeup
item.description: Hello! Once again, today we have another CTF writeup, yet again. Today’s CTF will be Chillhack from TryHackMe, but despite the title, it’s anything but chill. It involves the use of multiple techniques, such as reverse shell, remote code execution bypassing, steganography, horizonal escalation, code analysis and more. It’s pretty involved. You can read my PDF writeup here. Thanks for reading, – Jason
item.content:
Hello!

Once again, today we have another CTF writeup, yet again.

Today’s CTF will be Chillhack from TryHackMe, but despite the title, it’s anything but chill.

It involves the use of multiple techniques, such as reverse shell, remote code execution bypassing, steganography, horizonal escalation, code analysis and more. It’s pretty involved.

You can read my PDF writeup here.

Thanks for reading, – Jason

item.title: THM: BoilerCTF Writeup
item.description: Hello everyone! Today’s post will be about a writeup that I made for BoilerCTF on TryHackMe. This is a medium level CTF, just due to the sheer amount of rabbit holes there are. The link to the CTF is here. You can read my PDF writeup here. Enjoy! – Jason
item.content:
Hello everyone!

Today’s post will be about a writeup that I made for BoilerCTF on TryHackMe.

This is a medium level CTF, just due to the sheer amount of rabbit holes there are.

The link to the CTF is here.

You can read my PDF writeup here.

Enjoy!

– Jason

item.title: THM: Basic Pentesting CTF Writeup
item.description: Hello everyone! This is my first official writeup, I wanted to make it as similar to a real penetration test providing documentation in sections. Hope you enjoy reading. This writeup comes from a CTF called Basic Pentesting by ashu. You can view the PDF writeup here. – Jason
item.content:
Hello everyone!

This is my first official writeup, I wanted to make it as similar to a real penetration test providing documentation in sections. Hope you enjoy reading.

This writeup comes from a CTF called Basic Pentesting by ashu.

You can view the PDF writeup here.

– Jason
